entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:06 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 6:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 39 %
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: SE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.summary: A few rain showers or drizzle changing to a few flurries or drizzle near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
